originalText.text:
We will forever be indebted to Dr. Jacob! From being a phenonomonal dedicated doctor,  to an outstanding human being ! He is there for you at ALL times , ANYTIME ! He is a great great doctor , responsible,  knows exactly what he says, true to his word !! We can't thank God enough for directing us to Dr. Jacob..
May he be blessed !!

originalText.text: Best hernia doctor in the world. I highly recommend Doctor Jacob.  I had an amazing experience.  He took the best care of me.  After my hernia surgery I was able to play golf in four days. Dr. Jacobs did  an amazing job!!!. If I can give 10 stars, I would have give him 10 stars.

text.text: Best hernia doctor in the world. I highly recommend Doctor Jacob.  I had an amazing experience.  He took the best care of me.  After my hernia surgery I was able to play golf in four days. Dr. Jacobs did  an amazing job!!!. If I can give 10 stars, I would have give him 10 stars.

originalText.text: Dr. Jacob is an excellent surgeon. He is kind, compassionate and good at his job. I couldn't be more pleased with the entire process from start to finish. If you have to have anything operated on in the abdominal region, like a hernia, lump removal, abdominal repair of any kind, he's your guy. I'm not surprised that he's considered one of the best in this area of surgery. He's truly gifted. Thank you Dr. Jacob!

originalText.text:
Dr. Jacob is wonderful. He is kind and compassionate.  Most importantly, he truly listens.   I had severe abdominal pain and none of my doctors had a diagnosis.
I thought it might be a hernia, since I had once before and it was difficult to diagnosis. Since nothing showed up on MRI’s, CAT scans, or ultrasounds, I had no options.  The pain was incessant and went on for several months.  I was in the ER several times.

One of my friends found an article by Hillary Gulley in the Washington Post.
She discussed a similar pain and was treated and healed by Dr. Jacob.  So I stepped outside of my insurance network and travelled to NYC for an appointment.

Dr. Jacob patiently listened. His calmness put me at ease. Unlike my previous surgeon, he examined me thoroughly.    For the first time since the pain began, I felt hope.   He performed the surgery and found a stitch from my previous hernia repair was stuck in scar tissue and on a nerve.  He expertly removed it.

I am eternally grateful for Dr. Jacob.  He gave me back a life without pain and I trust him implicitly.  Excellent surgeon. Excellent human being. He is the best.

originalText.text: I recently had a diastasis recti repair and hernia removal with Dr. Jacob and cannot say enough positive things about the experience. From the consultation to the surgery to the aftercare, I knew I was in the best hands. I have always been extremely hesitant about hospitals and surgical procedures and Dr. Jacob put my mind at ease and created an ideal experience. I consulted with multiple surgeons in NYC and Dr. Jacob stood out in every way; the experience (and result) did not disappoint! I tell everyone I know how happy I am and recommend him with the highest vote of confidence.
